roleset.name: fall or slip back into a previous state

role.descr: previous state, usually prepositional complement, relapsed into what?

example.name: Arg 1 only, adjectival
example.text: Aren't the Islamic principles and religious precepts which this relapsed person has made fun of of value to you?

example.name: ARG2
example.text: After eighteen months the patient relapsed to the same condition as before operation
example.arg: to the same condition as before operation

roleset.note: RELAPSE-V NOTES: Watch out for adjectival usages. (from relapse.01-v)
